name: Atomic Journaling | Free Guide & Template
description: This exercise is related to the Manifest Weekly Planner, a system for swiftly moving through your week, but you don't need the planner to start an atomic journal in Notion!This exercise poses a few key questions that are essential to building a journal that reflects YOU.Included in the guide is a light version of the Weekly Planner, which looks at how your journal database can connect to other areas like projects or a daily planner, and how formatting your journal as a database unlocks so many o
